Title: Relates to prohibiting telephone, cable and utility companies from charging a fee to customers who request copies of previous bill statements or statements verifying that they are a customer
Summary: Prohibits telephone, cable and utility companies from charging a fee to customers who request copies of previous bill statements or statements verifying that they are a customer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting telephone, cable and utility companies from charging a fee to customers who request copies of previous billing statements or statements verifying that they are a customer
